feed.title: OpnForm Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for OpnForm: v1.6 - New docker setup + dev docker setup
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix EmailIntegrationActions for display emails by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/667
  • Enhance email settings functionality by adding sender address support by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/668
  • Add build context to compose by @kng in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/680
  • Developer docker setup by @JhumanJ in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/683

New Contributors

  • @kng made their first contribution in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/680

Full Changelog: https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/compare/v1.5...v1.6

entry.title: New release for OpnForm: v1.6.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Update nginx.conf by @niels-website in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/687
  • Fix tag selection method in home page component by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/690
  • Quill translate bug by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/689

New Contributors

  • @niels-website made their first contribution in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/687

Full Changelog: https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/compare/v1.6.1...v1.6.2

entry.title: New release for OpnForm: v1.6.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

Fixed docker build. * i18n Cookie issue by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/694 * Add support for additional language locales by @chiragchhatrala in https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/pull/693

Full Changelog: https://github.com/JhumanJ/OpnForm/compare/v1.6.3...v1.6.4
